item.title: Presentation
item.description: Conference invited Optimal Thresholding Test for High Dimensional Covariance Matrices, invited talk at IMS-China International Conference on Statistics and Probability, Dalian, China, July, 2019. Estimating Multi-level Partial Correlation Graphs, invited talk at 2019 ICSA Applied Statistics Symposium, Raleigh, June 2019. Thresholding Inference for Covariance Learning, 2018 ICSA China Conference with the Focus on Data Science, Qingdao, China, July 2-5, 2018. Thresholding Inference for Covariance Learning, The 8th International Forum on Statistics, Renmin University of China, Beijing, China, July 1-2, 2018.

item.title: Publication and manuscript
item.description: Selected publication Liang, Z., Qiu, Y. and Schnable, J. (2020). Genome-phenome Wide Association in Maize and Arabidopsis Identifies a Common Molecular and Evolutionary Signature. Molecular Plant. Code Adams, J., Qiu, Y., Xu, Y. and Schnable, J. (2020). Plant Segmentation by Deep Neural Nets. The Plant Phenome. Code Qiu, Y. and Liyanage, J. (2019). Threshold Selection for Covariance Estimation. Biometrics, 75 985-905. Code Chang, J., Qiu, Y.

item.title: Research interest
item.description: Inference on large covariance and precision matrices High-dimensional statistical inference and applications in genetic analysis Statistical analysis for brain imaging Causal inference High-throughput plant phenotying

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Stat 347: Probability and Statistical Theory for Data Science, Fall 2019 (ISU). Topics include introduction to probability, random variables and distribution functions; sampling distributions; theory of estimation; theory of inference; use of R statistical package for simulation and data analysis. Stat 501: Multivariate Statistical Methods, Spring 2019 (ISU). Topics include multivariate normal distribution; simultaneous analysis of multiple responses; MANOVA; high dimensional regression; PCA; factor analysis; classification methods. DS 202: Data Acquisition and Data Exploratory Analysis, Fall 2018 (ISU).
